short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove those annoying clickbaity video titles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove those annoying clickbaity video titles on Youtube!

This add-on will try to find a good alternative to annoying click bait titles on Youtube. Instead you will see titles which actually describe what is in the video.
